Note: Possibly intended for the same burden as the preceding hymn (796), ‘Stella celi micaris clare / regina celi letare’, f. 78.
Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: James Ryman, a macaronic hymn to the Virgin Mary — eight quatrains (abab) with alternating refrains, ‘Quem meruisti portare’ (ln. 2) and ‘Regina celi letare’ (ln. 4)

CULEe112.First Lines:
O emperesse the emperoureQuem meruisti
                    portare…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…That we may dwelle with hym & hisRegina celi
                        letare
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 282.
